EmailTemplate.name: ACV Auctions - Almost Done! Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: ACV Auctions - Almost Done!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're almost done!
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
I’ve had trouble reaching you on the phone. I’ve been calling because you started signing up with us recently, and you're almost done! I can help you finish up, all that’s needed are the following:
A copy of your dealership license
A copy of your state resale certificate
Your federal tax ID number (EIN)
Simply take a photo of these documents and send them to me by either replying to this email or texting me at the number below. Once I get those I will activate your account and give you a quick demo of the platform.
Thanks, {!Lead.IST_Rep__c} Business Development Representative {!Lead.IST_Rep_Phone__c}
Log in Now!
640 Ellicott St #108 Buffalo, NY 14203 www.acvauctions.com
Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences or unsubscribe.
Copyright © 2018 ACV Auctions, All rights reserved.
